points.name: ID
points.label: Model ID
points.desc: Model identifier

points.name: L
points.label: Model Length
points.desc: Model length

points.name: WChaMax
points.label: WChaMax
points.desc: Setpoint for maximum charge.

points.name: WChaGra
points.label: WChaGra
points.desc: Setpoint for maximum charging rate. Default is MaxChaRte.

points.name: WDisChaGra
points.label: WDisChaGra
points.desc: Setpoint for maximum discharge rate. Default is MaxDisChaRte.

points.name: StorCtl_Mod
points.label: StorCtl_Mod
points.desc: Activate hold/discharge/charge storage control mode. Bitfield value.

points.name: VAChaMax
points.label: VAChaMax
points.desc: Setpoint for maximum charging VA.

points.name: MinRsvPct
points.label: MinRsvPct
points.desc: Setpoint for minimum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

points.name: ChaState
points.label: ChaState
points.desc: Currently available energy as a percent of the capacity rating.

points.name: StorAval
points.label: StorAval
points.desc: State of charge (ChaState) minus storage reserve (MinRsvPct) times capacity rating (AhrRtg).

points.name: InBatV
points.label: InBatV
points.desc: Internal battery voltage.

points.name: ChaSt
points.label: ChaSt
points.desc: Charge status of storage device. Enumerated value.

points.name: OutWRte
points.label: OutWRte
points.desc: Percent of max discharge rate.

points.name: InWRte
points.label: InWRte
points.desc: Percent of max charging rate.

points.name: InOutWRte_WinTms
points.label: InOutWRte_WinTms
points.desc: Time window for charge/discharge rate change.

points.name: InOutWRte_RvrtTms
points.label: InOutWRte_RvrtTms
points.desc: Timeout period for charge/discharge rate.

points.name: InOutWRte_RmpTms
points.label: InOutWRte_RmpTms
points.desc: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

points.name: WChaMax_SF
points.label: WChaMax_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for maximum charge.

points.name: WChaDisChaGra_SF
points.label: WChaDisChaGra_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for maximum charge and discharge rate.

points.name: VAChaMax_SF
points.label: VAChaMax_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for maximum charging VA.

points.name: MinRsvPct_SF
points.label: MinRsvPct_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for minimum reserve percentage.

points.name: ChaState_SF
points.label: ChaState_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for available energy percent.

points.name: StorAval_SF
points.label: StorAval_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for state of charge.

points.name: InBatV_SF
points.label: InBatV_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for battery voltage.

points.name: InOutWRte_SF
points.label: InOutWRte_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for percent charge/discharge rate.
